Tips For Completing Your Profile

1. Include Any Missing Details of Your Professional Expertise:
  • Biography
  • Academics
  • Jurisdiction
  • Practice Area
  • Fees
  • Affiliations
  • Awards
  • Languages

2. Market Your Practice All in One Place:

Promote your websites, social media profiles, professional profiles and publications. Be sure to include links to Google Plus, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.

3. Answer Questions in Ask a Lawyer:

Earn points and badges while gaining exposure to potential clients. Ask a Lawyer is also a great way to participate in the legal community.
